Articles.Content:
Hey Guys & Gals,

I've made this fledgling space program in my career save. I'm about to embark on interplanetary missions from farming science in the Kerbin system. I keep seeing all these images on the KSP wiki of terrain maps and other things like that. I'm trying to find some mods that give me parts so that I may make these things too. I would like more parts to put on my interplanetary and latter interstellar (with the galaxy mod) ships and probes just because stock parts aren't enough for me. This game is so fun and I want to have more to do.

Thanks, toodles!
There is a forum sub-section for discussions of mods, and your thread has been moved to it.

I believe the maps on the wiki are from a long-moribund mod called ISA MapSat, but the big-name mapping mod these days is SCANsat.  DMagic also makes the excellent DMagic Orbital Science mod, which adds a bunch of cool new science instruments for probes and rovers (and some contracts to get you out there using them).
